text: "Donkey" is a song recorded by American country music artist Jerrod Niemann. It was released in May 2014 as the second single from his album High Noon. The song was written by David Tolliver, Kyle Jacobs, and Fred Wilhelm. ==Critical reception== Website Taste of Country gave the song a positive review, saying that "it’s more down-home than the auto-tune-heavy ‘Drink to That All Night.’ This is the song that could get you up and dancing at any of the best country bars — and Niemann knows it." ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2014) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:2014 singles Category:Jerrod Niemann songs Category:Arista Nashville singles Category:Songs written by Kyle Jacobs
title: Donkey (song)
